message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_FV_REDIRECT_TO_USERNAME_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Please select a user to redirect tasks to.

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_FV_START_DATE_TIME_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Please select a start date and time.

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_FV_REDIRECT_TO_USERNAME_MUST_BE_ACTIVE
message.locale: User "%1s" is not an active user, and tasks cannot be redirected to this user.

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_FV_REDIRECT_START_DATETIME_MUST_BE_IN_FUTURE
message.locale: Please select a start date and time that is in the future.

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_FV_REDIRECT_END_DATETIME_MUST_BE_LATER_THAN_START_DATETIME
message.locale: End date and time must be later than the start date and time.

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_XFV_ONLY_ONE_REDIRECT_TO_USERNAME_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Please select one user to redirect tasks to only.

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_XRV_REDIRECTION_TIME_PERIODS_CANNOT_OVERLAP
message.locale: New task redirection records cannot overlap with current or pending redirections. Please enter a new time period that does not overlap with another task redirection record.

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_XRV_REDIRECTION_USER_TIME_PERIODS_CANNOT_OVERLAP
message.locale: User "%1s" currently has active or pending redirections. Please enter a new time period that does not overlap with another task redirection record.

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_XRV_ALLOCATION_BLOCKING_TIME_PERIODS_CANNOT_OVERLAP
message.locale: New task redirection records cannot overlap with current or pending task allocation blocks. Please enter a new time period that does not overlap with a task allocation block record.

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_XRV_ALLOCATION_BLOCKING_USER
message.locale: User "%1s" is currently blocking Tasks. Please choose another user for redirection.

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_FV_REDIRECT_TO_TARGET_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: Please select a target to redirect tasks to.

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_FV_REDIRECT_TO_JOB_MUST_BE_ACTIVE
message.locale: Job "%1s" is not an active job, and tasks cannot be redirected to this job.

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_FV_REDIRECT_TO_POSITION_MUST_BE_ACTIVE
message.locale: Position "%1s" is not an active position, and tasks cannot be redirected to this position.

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_FV_REDIRECT_TO_ORGUNIT_MUST_BE_ACTIVE
message.locale: Organization "%1s" is not an active organization, and tasks cannot be redirected to this organization.
Organisation "%1s" is not an active organisation, and tasks cannot be redirected to this organisation.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_TYPE
message.locale: Invalid redirect type selected.

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_XFV_TARGET_SELECTION_INVALID
message.locale: Please select either of "Redirect To Users" or "Redirect To"

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_XFV_TARGET_CANNOT_BE_SAME_AS_CURRENTUSER
message.locale: Tasks cannot be redirected to self. Please select a different target to redirect tasks to.

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_XFV_TARGET_TYPE_AND_ID_DOESNOT_CORRESPOND
message.locale: The selected task redirection target does not exist. Please select a different target to redirect tasks to.

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_END_IS_MANDATORY_IF_AUTO_REASSIGN_BACK_IS_TRUE
message.locale: When Auto Re-assign back is enabled, an end date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_ACTIVE_CYCLIC_REDIRECTIONS_ARE_INVALID
message.locale: User "%1s" has an active Task Redirection specifying user "%2s" as the target. Please choose another user for redirection.

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_PENDING_CYCLIC_REDIRECTIONS_ARE_INVALID
message.locale: User "%1s" has an pending Task Redirection specifying user "%2s" as the target. Please choose another user for redirection.

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_ACTIVE_MULTI_LEVEL_REDIRECTIONS_ARE_INVALID
message.locale: User "%1s" has an active Task Redirection specifying %2s "%3s". Please choose another user for redirection.

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_PENDING_MULTI_LEVEL_REDIRECTIONS_ARE_INVALID
message.locale: User "%1s" has an pending Task Redirection specifying %2s "%3s". Please choose another user for redirection.

message.name: ERR_TASKREDIRECTION_MULTI_LEVEL_REDIRECTIONS_ARE_INVALID
message.locale: User "%1s" has Task Redirection(s) from "%2s" which overlaps with the specified time period.
